<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Regions</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/regions"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve a list of regions available.
